<! [CDATA[
Behaviour Interactive Logo Behaviour Interactive Inc. is a Canadian video game development studio specializing in the production of 2D and 3D action/adventure games for home video game consoles, handheld game consoles and personal computers. Source
You can download theBehaviour Interactivelogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
